sky_ad:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `info` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '简介',
  `link1` varchar(400) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接1',
  `link2` varchar(400) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接2',
  `starttime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '开始时间',
  `endtime` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '结束时间',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片地址',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgurl2` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `tag_id` (`tag_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_ad_tags:
CREATE TABLE `sky_ad_tags` (
  `tag_id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `m` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'index',
  `a` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'default',
  `width` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `height` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `tagno` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`tag_id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=25 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_admin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_admin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '账户名',
  `password` varchar(32) NOT NULL COMMENT '密码',
  `salt` smallint(6) NOT NULL COMMENT '加密串',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='管理员'
sky_article:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `catid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '分类',
  `keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关键字',
  `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布时间',
  `bstatus` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `is_img` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否有封面',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '封面图片',
  `is_temp` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '临时数据',
  `last_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最后发布时间',
  `is_recommend` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '推荐',
  `isnew` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最新',
  `ishot` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '最热',
  `view_num` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '访问数',
  `price` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '产品价格',
  `market_price` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00' COMMENT '市场价格',
  `total_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '库存数',
  `sold_num` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '销售数',
  `tpl` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '详情模板',
  `grade` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `downurl` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '下载地址',
  `downsize` decimal(9,2) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.00',
  `videourl` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `author` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `isindex` tinyint(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否首页',
  `content` mediumtext COMMENT '内容',
  `type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'article' COMMENT '类型',
  `comment_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fav_num` int(11) unsigned DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `catid` (`catid`,`id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=63 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='资讯'
sky_article_data:
CREATE TABLE `sky_article_data` (
  `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  `content` mediumtext NOT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_category:
CREATE TABLE `sky_category` (
  `catid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `pid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上级分类',
  `cname` varchar(20) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '分类名称',
  `orderindex` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `list_tpl` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '列表模板',
  `show_tpl` varchar(50) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '详情模板',
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '关键字',
  `description` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '描述',
  `bstatus` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `logo` varchar(225) DEFAULT '/static/images/category_logo.jpg' COMMENT '图标',
  `level` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '级数',
  `type` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'article' COMMENT '类型',
  `last_post` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`catid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=12 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='分类'
sky_comment:
CREATE TABLE `sky_comment` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tablename` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '表名称',
  `title` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `grade` decimal(5,1) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0.0',
  `ip` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `ip_city` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=16 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_config:
CREATE TABLE `sky_config` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `guestlogin` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '留言是否要登录 0不要 1要',
  `guestcheckcode` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `phone_on` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `phone_reg` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `phone_user` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `phone_pwd` varchar(100) NOT NULL,
  `phone_num` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='网站配置'
sky_dbcache:
CREATE TABLE `sky_dbcache` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `k` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `v` mediumtext NOT NULL,
  `expire` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `k` (`k`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=98 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_dbsession:
CREATE TABLE `sky_dbsession` (
  `id` char(100) NOT NULL,
  `data` text NOT NULL,
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `dateline` (`dateline`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='session'
sky_fav:
CREATE TABLE `sky_fav` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tablename` varchar(24) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '表名',
  `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `t_o` (`tablename`,`object_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=10 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='收藏'
sky_guest:
CREATE TABLE `sky_guest` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT '' COMMENT '主题',
  `userid` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '用户id',
  `catid` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '类型',
  `bstatus` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  `telephone` varchar(15) NOT NULL,
  `email` varchar(50) DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '邮箱',
  `qq` varchar(15) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'QQ',
  `dateline` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '留言时间',
  `content` text COMMENT '留言内容',
  `reply_content` text COMMENT '回复内容',
  `reply_time` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL COMMENT '回复时间',
  `nickname` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`,`id`) 
) ENGINE=MyISAM AUTO_INCREMENT=18 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='留言板'
sky_hello:
CREATE TABLE `sky_hello` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '主题',
  `content` text COMMENT '内容',
  `dateline` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '添加时间',
  `bstatus` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '状态',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `dateline` (`dateline`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='hello'
sky_html:
CREATE TABLE `sky_html` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '标题',
  `word` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '调用标签',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '发布时间',
  `info` text NOT NULL COMMENT '简介',
  `content` mediumtext COMMENT '内容',
  `bstatus` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `word` (`word`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='单页模块'
sky_imgs:
CREATE TABLE `sky_imgs` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `tablename` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '表名',
  `object_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '表id',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片',
  `title` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `tablename` (`tablename`,`object_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=18 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='图片表'
sky_link:
CREATE TABLE `sky_link` (
  `id` int(10) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) NOT NULL COMMENT '名称',
  `link_url` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接',
  `link_img` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图片',
  `type_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '类型 1首页 2内页',
  `orderindex` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `is_img` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '是否有图 1是 0否',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='友情链接'
sky_maxid:
CREATE TABLE `sky_maxid` (
  `id` bigint(20) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `t` tinyint(3) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=165898867 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='唯一Id'
sky_navbar:
CREATE TABLE `sky_navbar` (
  `id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(40) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '名称',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '排序',
  `link_url` varchar(100) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '链接',
  `target` varchar(10) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '跳转方式',
  `pid` mediumint(9) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0' COMMENT '上级',
  `group_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '所属组 如前台 后台',
  `m` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'm',
  `a` varchar(30) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'a',
  `bstatus` tinyint(4) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '状态',
  `logo` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '图标',
  `aclabel` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'active标签',
  `acvalue` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT 'active值',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=30 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='导航管理'
sky_seo:
CREATE TABLE `sky_seo` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `m` char(20) NOT NULL,
  `a` char(20) NOT NULL,
  `cname` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `title` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `keywords` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `object_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `s_m_a` (`m`,`a`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_sites:
CREATE TABLE `sky_sites` (
  `siteid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `sitename` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `domain` varchar(50) NOT NULL,
  `is_open` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1',
  `title` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `keywords` varchar(255) NOT NULL,
  `description` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `close_why` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `logo` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `icp` varchar(30) NOT NULL,
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL,
  `template` varchar(225) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'index',
  `statjs` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `index_template` varchar(225) NOT NULL,
  `wap_template` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT 'wap',
  `wapbg` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`siteid`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_template_config:
CREATE TABLE `sky_template_config` (
  `skinsdir` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `skinsdata` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`skinsdir`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='模板配置'
sky_user:
CREATE TABLE `sky_user` (
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `nickname` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '昵称',
  `username` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '用户名',
  `gender` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '1' COMMENT '性别',
  `user_head` varchar(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '/static/images/user_head.jpg' COMMENT '头像',
  `last_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '1988-02-01 12:12:12' COMMENT '最后登录时间',
  `salt` varchar(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '加密串',
  `password` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '' COMMENT '密码',
  `telephone` varchar(16) NOT NULL,
  `reg_time` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '2016-05-11 14:53:01' COMMENT '注册时间',
  `bstatus` tinyint(1) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `openid` varchar(64) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `xfrom` varchar(16) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `grade` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `comment_num` smallint(6) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`userid`),
  KEY `username` (`username`) ,
  KEY `nickname` (`nickname`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=223 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT='用户表'
sky_weixin:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `token` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `domain` varchar(20) NOT NULL,
  `catid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `logo` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `imgurl` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `isrecommend` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgsdata` text,
  `appid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `appkey` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `isshow` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `ysid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wx_username` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `wx_pwd` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `enkey` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=3 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_command:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_command` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `command` varchar(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT '',
  `type_id` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fun` varchar(255) DEFAULT '32',
  `isdefault` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `sc_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `wid` (`wid`) ,
  KEY `command` (`command`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_link:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_link` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `f_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `t_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `f_id` (`f_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_link_apply:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_link_apply` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `f_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `t_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `t_id` (`t_id`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_menu:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_menu` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `orderindex` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `title` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `w_type` varchar(10) DEFAULT '类型',
  `w_key` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `w_url` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `sc_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `userid` (`userid`) ,
  KEY `wid` (`wid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_reply:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_reply` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `status` tinyint(4) DEFAULT '0',
  `openid` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `msgtype` char(10) NOT NULL,
  `createtime` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `content` text,
  `msgid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `picurl` varchar(250) DEFAULT NULL,
  `mediaid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `thumbmediaid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `format` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `location_x` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `location_y` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  `scale` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `label` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL,
  `title` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL,
  `description` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL,
  `url` varchar(150) DEFAULT NULL,
  `wid` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `fromusername` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tousername` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_sucai:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_sucai` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `content` mediumtext,
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `pid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `imgurl` varchar(225) DEFAULT '',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `userid` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `description` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `linkurl` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `shopid` (`shopid`) ,
  KEY `pid` (`pid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
sky_weixin_user:
CREATE TABLE `sky_weixin_user` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `openid` varchar(64) DEFAULT NULL,
  `dateline` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `add_time` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `last_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `del_time` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `status` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `nickname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `sex` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL,
  `city` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `country` varchar(24) DEFAULT NULL,
  `province` varchar(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `user_head` varchar(225) DEFAULT NULL,
  `update_time` int(11) DEFAULT '0',
  `reply_num` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `wid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  `shopid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`),
  KEY `openid` (`openid`) 
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
